name: SearchIntercomContacts
description:
Search for contacts by their attributes.

Allows searching for multiple Intercom contacts using attribute-based filters. Supports combining filters with AND/OR operators to refine search results. Useful for retrieving specific contact data based on defined criteria.

parameters.name: intercom_api_version
parameters.description: Sets the Intercom API version to be used for the search. Accepts versions 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: contact_search_filters
parameters.description: A JSON object containing filters and pagination details to search for contacts. Use the 'query' key for defining search criteria with operators and fields. Use 'pagination' to specify 'per_page' and 'starting_after' for paginated results.

per_page.description: The number of results to fetch per page.

starting_after.description: The cursor to use in the next request to get the next page of results.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

per_page.description: The number of results to fetch per page.

starting_after.description: The cursor to use in the next request to get the next page of results.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
